trades.market: Russia x Ukraine ceasefire by March 31, 2026?
trades.reasoning: Conflict ongoing, no signs of imminent peace. 2 months insufficient. Longshot bias at play - retail overestimates peace likelihood.

trades.market: Will China invade Taiwan by end of 2026?
trades.reasoning: No military buildup observed, US deterrence strong, Xi focused on economy. Classic geopolitical longshot overpricing.

trades.market: No change in Fed interest rates after January 2026 meeting?
trades.reasoning: Fed signalled no January cut. Economy stable. Market already priced this in. Small edge but high confidence.
